name: Goreling
description: A small undead creature, the Goreling is characterized by its ability to swarm and multiply, making it a nuisance in numbers despite its low defense.
memorable: Its unique ability to multiply on taking damage can quickly overwhelm unsuspecting parties.
goals: Typically seeks to swarm and overwhelm prey.
relations: Gorelings can often be found in groups, as their abilities enhance when several are nearby.
environment: Commonly found in dark and abandoned places.
strengths: Can amplify damage in groups and multiply rapidly after taking damage.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma, making it ineffective in social situations.
attacks: Performs a Slam attack dealing bludgeoning and necrotic damage, enhanced when in groups.
most_powerful_ability: Bloodthirsty, which boosts its attack damage significantly when in numbers.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, sensing objects and creatures even while blinded.
skills: Skilled in stealth, allowing it to move quietly despite its size.
additional_information: Immunities to necrotic damage and poison damage.
Weakness in social and problem-solving situations.
Passive perception score is very low at 7.
Can swarm with up to five other Gorelings in the same space.
Easily overwhelmed if encountered alone due to low hit points.
test_queries: small undead that multiplies when hit
creature that swarms and splits into smaller versions
nimble undead with necrotic damage abilities
undead that excels in numbers with Bloodthirsty ability
blindsighted creature that can swarm in combat
